thread.title: Agents enjoy a welcome to Miami with new cruise incentive
thread.title_full: Agents enjoy a welcome to Miami with new cruise incentive

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Agents enjoy a welcome to Miami with new cruise incentive
text:
Agents enjoy a welcome to Miami with new cruise incentive Agents enjoy a welcome to Miami with new cruise incentive Details Category: Cruise Created   14:45 Celebrity Cruises is offering agents selling cruise holidays around the world the opportunity to join them on an exclusive long weekend in Miami. Any agent who sells a 2016 Celebrity Cruises holiday, featuring long haul flights with British Airways, between 1 September and 31 October 2015 is in with a chance of enjoying the fam trip to Miami hosted by the Celebrity Cruises UK and Ireland sales team. 
2016 cruise holidays in destinations such as Alaska, the Caribbean, Asia and Australia are all applicable as part of the new incentive. Agents will be entered into a prize draw to win one of six places on the fam trip to explore Miamiâ€™s iconic beaches, art deco architecture and its phenomenal options for cruise visitors. Six agents will join Celebrity Cruises and British airways in Miami for three nights, including a day spent on-board a Celebrity Cruises ship, as well as free time in Miami and the chance to meet the Celebrity Cruises head office team.
